name: Atlas M-1
description:
Altas M-1 is a 3-to-5 minute art and sound experience made for MSCH-G320 at Indiana University Bloomington for my Spring 2022 semester. This experience was made to challenge me to make an unsettling atmosphere using SFX, ambiance, and visual effects.

NOTE: the game is not finished, elements may change before the final release.

Controls

  • RMB on Aim Dial -> Rotates cannon clockwise
  • LMB on Aim Dial -> Rotates cannon counterclockwise
  • LMB on Switch -> Flip Switch on or off
  • LMB on Button -> Press Button

Note: Pressing Start on the Home Screen will make the game go fullscreen.
